meanings.sent1: The exhilarative music at the party made everyone dance joyfully.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride was exhilarative and filled me with joy.
meanings.sent3: The exhilarative surprise party left everyone smiling from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: The exhilarative feeling of winning the race was like a burst of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The exhilarative fireworks display lit up the night sky with excitement.

meanings.definition: To make someone feel very happy and excited.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes never fail to exhilarate the audience.
meanings.sent2: The thrilling movie plot exhilarated the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks never fail to exhilarate the children at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The coach's motivational speech exhilarated the team before the big game.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party exhilarated Sarah beyond words.
